enableInstrumentAsCollateral(address,uin.details: enables a instrument to be used as collateral

params._baseLTVasCollateral: the loan to value of the asset when used as collateral
params._liquidationBonus: the bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset*
params._liquidationThreshold: the threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized

params._instrument: the address of the instrument to be initialized
params._interestRateStrategyAddress: the address of the interest rate strategy contract for this instrument*

setInstrumentBaseLTVasCollateral(address.details: emitted when a _instrument loan to value is updated

params._ltv: the new value for the loan to value*

setInstrumentInterestRateStrategyAddress.details: sets the interest rate strategy of a _instrument

params._rateStrategyAddress: the new address of the interest strategy contract*

setInstrumentLiquidationBonus(address,ui.details: updates the liquidation bonus of a _instrument

params._bonus: the new value for the liquidation bonus*

setInstrumentLiquidationThreshold(addres.details: updates the liquidation threshold of a _instrument.

params._threshold: the new value for the liquidation threshold*

params.borrowRateSwitch: true if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled & false if it needs to be disabled*

switchInstrumentFreeze(address,bool).details: freezes an _instrument. A freezed _instrument doesn't accept any new deposit, borrow or rate swap, but can accept repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and redeems
